# Trading Monster AI

> TradingMonster.ai is an AI-powered forex trend trading system that helps intraday traders analyze market trends, validate setups, and make more structured trading decisions.

## Key Pages
- [Home](https://tradingmonster.ai/): Overview of Trading Monster AI, main benefits, hero content, and primary call-to-actions.
- [About](https://tradingmonster.ai/about): Background on Trading Monster AI, who it is for, and how the system works.
- [Pricing](https://tradingmonster.ai/#unlock-full-access): Pricing and subscription details for accessing the AI trading system.
- [Free Trial](https://tradingmonster.ai/#trial-form): Lead form and information about the 3-day free demo.

## Legal & Compliance
- [Terms and Conditions](https://tradingmonster.ai/terms-and-conditions): Terms of use and conditions for using Trading Monster AI.
- [Privacy Policy](https://tradingmonster.ai/privacy-policy): How user data is collected, processed, and protected.
- [Refund Policy](https://tradingmonster.ai/refund-policy): Refund rules and conditions.
- [Cookie Policy](https://tradingmonster.ai/cookie-policy): Information about cookies and tracking technologies used on the site.
- [Cancellation Policy](https://tradingmonster.ai/cancellation-policy): Rules for cancelling subscriptions or services.
- [Disclaimer](https://tradingmonster.ai/disclaimer): Risk and educational-use disclaimer for trading and financial content.

## Optional
- [Thank You](https://tradingmonster.ai/thank-you): Confirmation page shown after successful lead or purchase actions.
